Brand: CodeRed

* STORY * 

As the daughter of the Hero who saved the world, Selene dreamed of traveling it herself. 
One day she persuaded her grandparents to let her go out on her own, 
and discovered in a deep well a profound message pertaining to her mother's death......

Her life has been a lie, and Selene's travels will take her, ultimately, to the truth. 

* GAME * 

CodeRed presents an ultra-retro Gameboyo-era R-18 black and white RPG! 
Classic mechanics, pixel graphics, easy to play but doesn't hold your hand too much, 
a delightful blend of old school nostalgia and contemporary hentai! 

* Over 30 base HCGs (24 events with humans!) 
* 8 animations when defeated by enemy monsters
* 8 different varieties of pose art/outfits 

* SYSTEM * 

Message skipping, quick battle, event appreciation mode, circular play and more
Dig in and explore every corner or speedrun to the end! 
Beat the game without viewing a single ecchi scene, if you want! (except the first one) 

The game is adaptable to different play styles. 
There's also a secret way to unlock every ecchi event right away.
